√lajj 'be ashamed'

present: [6.] lajjate etc.  lajjati etc. E.+  

perfect: lalajjire  

[aorist: alajjiṣṭa  lajjiṣyate  lajjitā  ]

verbal: lajjita  lajjitum  

secondary: intensive: lālajj-   -- desiderative: lilajjiṣa-   -- causative: lajjayati etc.  

derivatives: lajjā E.+
